field.filter: SELECT IPAddress AS ip JOIN IPConfig AS c ON ip.ipconfig_id = c.id WHERE c.attach_already_allocated_ips != 'yes' AND ip.status NOT IN ('allocated', 'reserved') AND ip.org_id = :this->org_id UNION SELECT IPAddress AS ip JOIN IPConfig AS c ON ip.ipconfig_id = c.id WHERE c.attach_already_allocated_ips = 'yes' AND ip.status NOT IN ('reserved') AND ip.org_id = :this->org_id
